projects.name: nba.js
projects.description: Node.js library to interface with current and historical NBA stats, scores, and data.

projects.name: Show Me a Movie
projects.description: Command line utility that leverages the IMDb API to stream movies via The Pirate Bay.

projects.name: Brampton Transit API
projects.description: Scraper and REST API to interface with live Brampton Transit bus times.

projects.name: SEEN it
projects.description: Web application to stream videos via /r/videos, a replacement for the deprecated reddit.tv.

projects.name: Find Me a Job
projects.description: Web platform that matches a job seeker with their "perfect" company by analyzing the technical skills and experience on their résumé.

projects.name: Tweetbot
projects.description: Twitter bot to automatically reply to mentions that contain a specified phrase.

projects.name: Border Times
projects.description: REST API and scraper for live Canadian border wait times.

projects.name: Bikeshare
projects.description: A Node.js wrapper for the Toronto Bikeshare API (real-time bike availability and locations).

projects.name: cobalt-uoft.py
projects.description: A Python wrapper to interface with Cobalt, University of Toronto open data APIs and datasets.

projects.name: uoft-coursefinder
projects.description: A Node.js library and CLI for interfacing with Course Finder, UofT's course index.

work.name: Chapsule
work.description: Manage and contribute to core technical projects, including RESTful API and React Native mobile applications.

work.name: Ontario Public Service
work.description: Developed software for enterprise-wide web-based Intranet platform, serving over 35 000 users daily.

work.name: App Mastery
work.description: Built native Smart TV applications for audio / video streaming.

work.name: Empower Youth Vision
work.description: Redesigned and developed website, with focus on content scaling and ease of use.
